name: BARTHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask bart helper for updates”
”Alexa, ask bart helper for the fare from Colma to Concord”
”Alexa, open bart helper”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bart helper
des: Ever been stuck commuting by BART only to find out that major delays are expected? BART helper delivers up-to-date news regarding service advisories and delays that may impact your commute time, so you can make informed decisions ahead of time. BART helper also provides you with up-to-date information regarding the fares between stations for the four major types of fares (Clipper card, BART blue ticket, Senior Clipper card, and Youth Clipper card).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
